title: Fact Check: Remaining CBSE board exams are NOT resuming from April 22 | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A circular attributed to the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE) is doing the rounds on social media according to which ‘the remaining board examinations of class 10th and 12th which were postponed due to the Coronavirus outbreak will resume from April 22, 2020’.

ALSO READ: Fact Check: Viral video of a woman jumping off a building…

NewsMobile fact-checked the circular and found it to be FAKE.

During our research on this news, we found a tweet from the Press Information Bureau (PIB), where they have explicitly clarified that this information is untrue and the exam dates have not been fixed yet.

Hence, the above information proves that the viral circular is FAKE.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
